name: grunt-ftp-deploy
description: Rotinas para fazer deploy em ftp utilizando Grunt

scripts.deploy: cross-env node_modules/grunt/bin/grunt clone && cross-env node_modules/grunt/bin/grunt deploy
scripts.deploy-prod: cross-env node_modules/grunt/bin/grunt clone  && cross-env node_modules/grunt/bin/grunt deploy --env=producao

author: Thiago Bartels
